abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Poverty Reduction Support
            Credit (PRSC3) Project is one of a series of single tranche
            Poverty Reduction Support Credits (PRSCs), provided in the
            form of budget support.  In the area of governance, PRSC 3
            will provide assistance for implementation of the 2005
            Priority Action Plan for public expenditure management
            reforms, developing and implementing its 2006 Priority
            Action Plan. The PRSC 3 also deepens support for the
            Government's anti-corruption agenda. It also supports
            the implementation of a reform program for customs. In the
            area of human and material security, the PRSC 3 supports the
            Government's Education for All Agenda and improving
            service delivery in nutrition, health and rural water
            supply. PRSC 3 continues to support policy and institutional
            reform in the nutrition sector. In rural water, PRSC 3
            supports the implementation of the water and sanitation
            strategy for all. In health, the PRSC supports improvements
            in sector budgeting and financing as well as improved access
            and quality of service delivery.
